mapper.select: select t.medicineId code,t.firmId, m.`name`,p.spec,p.firm,p.priceMinPackage,dosageUnit,p.minPackageUnit,IFNULL(t.valamt,0)*m.packageDosageAmount dosageTotalAmount,packageDosageAmount, IFNULL(t.valamt,0) packageTotalAmount,ROUND(IFNULL(t.valamt,0)*p.priceMinPackage,2) shouldCost, 'NO_FINISH' state,1 as isCharged,t.chargedType from tmp_med_pay_temp t left JOIN bas_medicine m on t.medicineId=m.medicineId left JOIN bas_price p on m.code=p.code and IF(ISNULL(p.firmId),'',p.firmId) = IF(ISNULL(t.firmId), '',t.firmId) where chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.medicineId code,t.firmId,m.`name` ,p.spec,p.priceMinPackage ,dosageUnit,t.medPayTempId, t.valamt packageTotalAmount,t.chargedType from tmp_med_pay_temp t left JOIN bas_medicine m on t.medicineId=m.medicineId left JOIN bas_price p on m.code=p.code and p.firmId = t.firmId where chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and chargedType = #{chargedType}
mapper.insert: insert into tmp_med_pay_temp (medPayTempId, valamt, medicineId, firmId, chargeMedTempId,chargedType,beid) values (#{medPayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valamt,jdbcType=REAL}, #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tmp_med_pay_temp
medPayTempId,
valamt,
medicineId,
firmId,
chargeMedTempId,
chargedType,
beid,
#{medPayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{valamt,jdbcType=REAL},
#{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tmp_med_pay_temp
valamt = #{valamt,jdbcType=REAL},
medicineId = #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firmId = #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chargedType = #{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where medPayTempId = #{medPayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tmp_med_pay_temp set valamt = #{valamt,jdbcType=REAL}, medicineId = #{medicineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chargeMedTempId = #{chargeMedTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firmId = #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chargedType = #{chargedType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where medPayTempId = #{medPayTempId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
